additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Onion, Sunflower Oil, Garlic, Ginger, Tomato Paste, Salt, Sugar, Spices (2.4%) (Cassia, Black pepper, Cumin, Bay Leaf, Black Cardamom, Turmeric Powder, Clove, Green Cardamom, Mace, Fenugreek Seed), Dried Fenugreek Leaf.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: MAY CONTAN TRACES OF MILK, MUSTARD, NUTS, SESAME, PEANUTS, CELERY, SULPHITES, GLUTEN & SOYA

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Mustard, May Be Present Nuts, May Be Present Sesame, May Be Present Soy, May Be Present Milk, May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Gluten, May Be Present Sulphites

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not use if pouch is bloated or leaking. Not suitable for microwave use.

description: Korma PasteOur Korma paste is mellow, creamy and flavorful. It adds a delicious warmth to any dish.We use only the best spices and ingredients so our pastes are packed with layers of flavour. They are the soul of all great curries and so much more. Stir in to flavour your food from the inside out!
name: Korma Paste
